item.title: PHPè¯­è¨€çš„çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹-4

åœ¨ PHP ä¸­ï¼Œé…ç½®é¡¹ï¼ˆINI é…ç½®é¡¹ï¼‰å…·æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„ä½œç”¨åŸŸï¼ˆINI Scopeï¼‰ï¼Œè¿™å†³å®šäº†è¯¥é…ç½®é¡¹å¯ä»¥åœ¨å“ªäº›åœ°æ–¹è¢«ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚PHP å®šä¹‰äº†ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ ç§ä½œç”¨åŸŸå¸¸é‡ï¼ˆå®šä¹‰åœ¨ php.ini çš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­ï¼‰ï¼š

1. PHP_INI_USER

  • å«ä¹‰ï¼šå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·è„šæœ¬ä¸­é€šè¿‡ ini_set() åŠ¨æ€ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚
  • å¯ä¿®æ”¹ä½ç½®ï¼š
    • .htaccessï¼ˆApacheï¼‰
    • httpd.conf ä¸­çš„ <Directory>ã€<Location> ç­‰ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå…è®¸ï¼‰
    • PHP è„šæœ¬ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ ini_set()
  • ç¤ºä¾‹é…ç½®é¡¹ï¼šdisplay_errorsã€error_reportingã€memory_limitï¼ˆéƒ¨åˆ†ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰

2. PHP_INI_PERDIR

  • å«ä¹‰ï¼šå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç›®å½•å±‚çº§çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­è®¾ç½®ï¼Œä½†ä¸èƒ½åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶é€šè¿‡ ini_set() ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

  • ä¸å¯åœ¨ PHP è„šæœ¬ä¸­ç”¨ ini_set() ä¿®æ”¹

3. PHP_INI_SYSTEM

  • å«ä¹‰ï¼šåªèƒ½åœ¨ç³»ç»Ÿçº§é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­è®¾ç½®ï¼Œå¯¹æ•´ä¸ª PHP ç¯å¢ƒç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚

4. PHP_INI_ALL

  • å«ä¹‰ï¼šç­‰ä»·äº PHP_INI_USER | PHP_INI_PERDIR | PHP_INI_SYSTEMï¼Œå³æ‰€æœ‰åœ°æ–¹éƒ½å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®ã€‚

item.title: PHPè¯­è¨€çš„çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹-3
item.description:
PHP çš„ SPL autoloaderï¼ˆStandard PHP Library Autoloadingï¼‰æ˜¯ PHP æä¾›çš„ä¸€å¥—æ ‡å‡†åŒ–ã€å¯æ‰©å±•çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œç”¨äºåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶æŒ‰éœ€åŠ è½½ç±»ã€æ¥å£æˆ– trait æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œé¿å…æ‰‹åŠ¨å†™å¤§é‡ require/includeã€‚

å®ƒæ˜¯ç°ä»£ PHP è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½ï¼ˆå¦‚ PSR-4ã€Composerï¼‰çš„åŸºç¡€ã€‚

ğŸ“Œ ä¸€ã€ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ SPL Autoloaderï¼Ÿ

SPLï¼ˆStandard PHP Libraryï¼‰ä» PHP 5.1 å¼€å§‹å†…ç½®ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­æœ€å…³é”®çš„åŠŸèƒ½ä¹‹ä¸€å°±æ˜¯ spl_autoload_register() å‡½æ•°ã€‚

âœ… å®ƒå…è®¸ä½ æ³¨å†Œä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå½“ PHP é‡åˆ°æœªå®šä¹‰çš„ç±»æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šä¾æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨è¿™äº›å‡½æ•°å°è¯•åŠ è½½ã€‚

ğŸ”§ äºŒã€æ ¸å¿ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼šspl_autoload_register()

åŸºæœ¬è¯­æ³•ï¼š

1spl_autoload_register(callable $callback, bool $throw = true, bool $prepend = false): bool
  • $callbackï¼šå½“ç±»æœªå®šä¹‰æ—¶è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆå¯ä»¥æ˜¯å‡½æ•°åã€é—­åŒ…ã€é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ç­‰ï¼‰ã€‚
  • $throwï¼šæ˜¯å¦åœ¨ autoload å¤±è´¥æ—¶æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ trueï¼‰ã€‚
  • $prependï¼šæ˜¯å¦å°†æ­¤ loader æ’å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—æœ€å‰é¢ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤åŠ åœ¨æœ«å°¾ï¼‰ã€‚

âœ… ä¸‰ã€ç®€å•ç¤ºä¾‹

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼šåŸºç¡€è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½å™¨

 1// è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½å‡½æ•°
 2function myAutoloader($className) {
 3    // å°†å‘½åç©ºé—´ \ è½¬ä¸ºç›®å½•åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
 4    $path = str_replace('\\', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $className);
 5    $file = __DIR__ . '/src/' . $path . '.php';
 6
 7    if (file_exists($file)) {
 8        require_once $file;
 9    }
10}
11
12// æ³¨å†Œ
13spl_autoload_register('myAutoloader');
14
15// ä½¿ç”¨
16$obj = new MyApp\Controller\User(); // è‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½ src/MyApp/Controller/User.php

ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼šä½¿ç”¨é—­åŒ…ï¼ˆåŒ¿åå‡½æ•°ï¼‰

1spl_autoload_register(function ($class) {
2    $file = 'classes/' . $class . '.php';
3    if (file_exists($file)) {
4        require $file;
5    }
6});

ç¤ºä¾‹ 3ï¼šæ³¨å†Œå¤šä¸ªè‡ªåŠ¨åŠ è½½å™¨

 1spl_autoload_register(function ($class) {
 2    // å°è¯•ä» lib/ åŠ è½½
 3    $file = "lib/$class.php";
 4    if (file_exists($file)) {
 5        require $file;
 6        return true;
 7    }
 8});
 9
10spl_autoload_register(function ($class) {
11    // å°è¯•ä» vendor/ åŠ è½½
12    $file = "vendor/$class.php";
13    if (file_exists($file)) {
14        require $file;
15        return true;
16    }
17});

âš ï¸ æ³¨æ„ï¼šåªè¦ä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ª autoload å‡½æ•°æˆåŠŸåŠ è½½äº†ç±»ï¼Œåç»­çš„å°±ä¸ä¼šå†æ‰§è¡Œã€‚

item.title: PHPè¯­è¨€çš„çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹-2
item.description:
ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å°†ä½ æä¾›çš„ Go è¯­è¨€ä»£ç ï¼ˆHTTP çŠ¶æ€ç å¸¸é‡å’Œ StatusText å‡½æ•°ï¼‰å®Œæ•´è½¬æ¢ä¸º PHP è¯­è¨€çš„å®ç°ã€‚PHP ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰åŸç”Ÿçš„ const å—ï¼Œä½†æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ define() æˆ– class ä¸­çš„ const æ¥å®šä¹‰å¸¸é‡ï¼Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨ç±»å°è£…çš„æ–¹å¼æ›´æ¸…æ™°ã€‚

âœ… PHP å®ç°ï¼šHTTP çŠ¶æ€ç å¸¸é‡ + çŠ¶æ€æ–‡æœ¬å‡½æ•°

  1<?php
  2
  3class HttpStatus
  4{
  5    // 1xx Informational
  6    const StatusContinue                   = 100;
  7    const StatusSwitchingProtocols         = 101;
  8    const StatusProcessing                 = 102;
  9    const StatusEarlyHints                 = 103;
 10
 11    // 2xx Success
 12    const StatusOK                         = 200;
 13    const StatusCreated                    = 201;
 14    const StatusAccepted                   = 202;
 15    const StatusNonAuthoritativeInfo       = 203;
 16    const StatusNoContent                  = 204;
 17    const StatusResetContent               = 205;
 18    const StatusPartialContent             = 206;
 19    const StatusMultiStatus                = 207;
 20    const StatusAlreadyReported            = 208;
 21    const StatusIMUsed                     = 226;
 22
 23    // 3xx Redirection
 24    const StatusMultipleChoices            = 300;
 25    const StatusMovedPermanently           = 301;
 26    const StatusFound                      = 302;
 27    const StatusSeeOther                   = 303;
 28    const StatusNotModified                = 304;
 29    const StatusUseProxy                   = 305;
 30    // 306 is unused, skipped
 31    const StatusTemporaryRedirect          = 307;
 32    const StatusPermanentRedirect          = 308;
 33
 34    // 4xx Client Error
 35    const StatusBadRequest                 = 400;
 36    const StatusUnauthorized               = 401;
 37    const StatusPaymentRequired            = 402;
 38    const StatusForbidden                  = 403;
 39    const StatusNotFound                   = 404;
 40    const StatusMethodNotAllowed           = 405;
 41    const StatusNotAcceptable              = 406;
 42    const StatusProxyAuthRequired          = 407;
 43    const StatusRequestTimeout             = 408;
 44    const StatusConflict                   = 409;
 45    const StatusGone                       = 410;
 46    const StatusLengthRequired             = 411;
 47    const StatusPreconditionFailed         = 412;
 48    const StatusRequestEntityTooLarge      = 413;
 49    const StatusRequestURITooLong          = 414;
 50    const StatusUnsupportedMediaType       = 415;
 51    const StatusRequestedRangeNotSatisfiable = 416;
 52    const StatusExpectationFailed          = 417;
 53    const StatusTeapot                     = 418;
 54    const StatusMisdirectedRequest         = 421;
 55    const StatusUnprocessableEntity        = 422;
 56    const StatusLocked                     = 423;
 57    const StatusFailedDependency           = 424;
 58    const StatusTooEarly                   = 425;
 59    const StatusUpgradeRequired            = 426;
 60    const StatusPreconditionRequired       = 428;
 61    const StatusTooManyRequests            = 429;
 62    const StatusRequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge = 431;
 63    const StatusUnavailableForLegalReasons = 451;
 64
 65    // 5xx Server Error
 66    const StatusInternalServerError        = 500;
 67    const StatusNotImplemented             = 501;
 68    const StatusBadGateway                 = 502;
 69    const StatusServiceUnavailable         = 503;
 70    const StatusGatewayTimeout             = 504;
 71    const StatusHTTPVersionNotSupported    = 505;
 72    const StatusVariantAlsoNegotiates      = 506;
 73    const StatusInsufficientStorage        = 507;
 74    const StatusLoopDetected               = 508;
 75    const StatusNotExtended                = 510;
 76    const StatusNetworkAuthenticationRequired = 511;
 77
 78    /**
 79     * Returns the reason phrase for the given HTTP status code.
 80     *
 81     * @param int $code HTTP status code
 82     * @return string The reason phrase, or empty string if unknown.
 83     */
 84    public static function statusText(int $code): string
 85    {
 86        return match ($code) {
 87            self::StatusContinue => 'Continue',
 88            self::StatusSwitchingProtocols => 'Switching Protocols',
 89            self::StatusProcessing => 'Processing',
 90            self::StatusEarlyHints => 'Early Hints',
 91
 92            self::StatusOK => 'OK',
 93            self::StatusCreated => 'Created',
 94            self::StatusAccepted => 'Accepted',
 95            self::StatusNonAuthoritativeInfo => 'Non-Authoritative Information',
 96            self::StatusNoContent => 'No Content',
 97            self::StatusResetContent => 'Reset Content',
 98            self::StatusPartialContent => 'Partial Content',
 99            self::StatusMultiStatus => 'Multi-Status',
100            self::StatusAlreadyReported => 'Already Reported',
101            self::StatusIMUsed => 'IM Used',
102
103            self::StatusMultipleChoices => 'Multiple Choices',
104            self::StatusMovedPermanently => 'Moved Permanently',
105            self::StatusFound => 'Found',
106            self::StatusSeeOther => 'See Other',
107            self::StatusNotModified => 'Not Modified',
108            self::StatusUseProxy => 'Use Proxy',
109            self::StatusTemporaryRedirect => 'Temporary Redirect',
110            self::StatusPermanentRedirect => 'Permanent Redirect',
111
112            self::StatusBadRequest => 'Bad Request',
113            self::StatusUnauthorized => 'Unauthorized',
114            self::StatusPaymentRequired => 'Payment Required',
115            self::StatusForbidden => 'Forbidden',
116            self::StatusNotFound => 'Not Found',
117            self::StatusMethodNotAllowed => 'Method Not Allowed',
118            self::StatusNotAcceptable => 'Not Acceptable',
119            self::StatusProxyAuthRequired => 'Proxy Authentication Required',
120            self::StatusRequestTimeout => 'Request Timeout',
121            self::StatusConflict => 'Conflict',
122            self::StatusGone => 'Gone',
123            self::StatusLengthRequired => 'Length Required',
124            self::StatusPreconditionFailed => 'Precondition Failed',
125            self::StatusRequestEntityTooLarge => 'Request Entity Too Large',
126            self::StatusRequestURITooLong => 'Request URI Too Long',
127            self::StatusUnsupportedMediaType => 'Unsupported Media Type',
128            self::StatusRequestedRangeNotSatisfiable => 'Requested Range Not Satisfiable',
129            self::StatusExpectationFailed => 'Expectation Failed',
130            self::StatusTeapot => "I'm a teapot",
131            self::StatusMisdirectedRequest => 'Misdirected Request',
132            self::StatusUnprocessableEntity => 'Unprocessable Entity',
133            self::StatusLocked => 'Locked',
134            self::StatusFailedDependency => 'Failed Dependency',
135            self::StatusTooEarly => 'Too Early',
136            self::StatusUpgradeRequired => 'Upgrade Required',
137            self::StatusPreconditionRequired => 'Precondition Required',
138            self::StatusTooManyRequests => 'Too Many Requests',
139            self::StatusRequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge => 'Request Header Fields Too Large',
140            self::StatusUnavailableForLegalReasons => 'Unavailable For Legal Reasons',
141
142            self::StatusInternalServerError => 'Internal Server Error',
143            self::StatusNotImplemented => 'Not Implemented',
144            self::StatusBadGateway => 'Bad Gateway',
145            self::StatusServiceUnavailable => 'Service Unavailable',
146            self::StatusGatewayTimeout => 'Gateway Timeout',
147            self::StatusHTTPVersionNotSupported => 'HTTP Version Not Supported',
148            self::StatusVariantAlsoNegotiates => 'Variant Also Negotiates',
149            self::StatusInsufficientStorage => 'Insufficient Storage',
150            self::StatusLoopDetected => 'Loop Detected',
151            self::StatusNotExtended => 'Not Extended',
152            self::StatusNetworkAuthenticationRequired => 'Network Authentication Required',
153
154            default => ''
155        };
156    }
157}
158
159// --- ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ ---
160// echo HttpStatus::statusText(200); // è¾“å‡º: OK
161// echo HttpStatus::statusText(404); // è¾“å‡º: Not Found
162// echo HttpStatus::statusText(999); // è¾“å‡º: (ç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²)

ğŸ” è¯´æ˜

  1. PHP ç‰ˆæœ¬è¦æ±‚ï¼š

item.title: PHPè¯­è¨€çš„çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹-1
item.description:
ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ PHP 7.0 åˆ° PHP 8.4 æ¯ä¸ªä¸»è¦ç‰ˆæœ¬æ‰€æœ‰å…³é”®å˜æ›´çš„å®Œæ•´æ¸…å•ï¼Œæ¯é¡¹å‡ä»¥ æ¸…æ™°ã€ç‹¬ç«‹ã€å¯è¿è¡Œï¼ˆæˆ–è¯´æ˜æ€§ï¼‰çš„ä»£ç å—å½¢å¼å‘ˆç°ï¼Œä¾¿äºä½ é€æ¡å¤åˆ¶ã€æµ‹è¯•å’Œå¤ä¹ ã€‚

ğŸ“˜ PHP 7.0 â€“ 8.4 å„ç‰ˆæœ¬æ–°å¢åŠŸèƒ½ä¸é‡è¦å˜æ›´ï¼ˆå¸¦å®Œæ•´ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼‰

ğŸ”¹ PHP 7.0

 1// 1. æ ‡é‡ç±»å‹å£°æ˜ï¼ˆéœ€ strict_typesï¼‰
 2declare(strict_types=1);
 3function add(int $a, int $b): int {
 4    return $a + $b;
 5}
 6echo add(2, 3); // 5
 7
 8// 2. è¿”å›ç±»å‹å£°æ˜
 9function getName(): string {
10    return "Alice";
11}
12
13// 3. Null åˆå¹¶è¿ç®—ç¬¦
14$username = $_GET['user'] ?? 'guest';
15
16// 4. å¤ªç©ºèˆ¹è¿ç®—ç¬¦
17echo 1 <=> 2; // -1
18echo 2 <=> 2; // 0
19echo 3 <=> 2; // 1
20
21// 5. åŒ¿åç±»
22$logger = new class {
23    public function log(string $msg) {
24        echo "[LOG] $msg\n";
25    }
26};
27$logger->log("Hello");
28
29// 6. Group use
30use Some\Namespace\{ClassA, ClassB as B};
31
32// 7. ç§»é™¤ mysql_*ï¼ˆä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç åœ¨ PHP 7+ æŠ¥é”™ï¼‰
33// $conn = mysql_connect(); // âŒ Fatal error
34
35// 8. å®‰å…¨éšæœºæ•°
36$bytes = random_bytes(16);
37$int = random_int(1, 100);
38
39// 9. Closure::call()
40$obj = (object)['x' => 42];
41(function() { echo $this->x; })->call($obj); // 42

ğŸ”¹ PHP 7.1

 1// 1. å¯ä¸ºç©ºç±»å‹
 2function say(?string $name): void {
 3    echo $name ?? 'Anonymous';
 4}
 5say(null); // Anonymous
 6
 7// 2. void è¿”å›ç±»å‹
 8function dump(mixed $x): void {
 9    var_dump($x);
10}
11
12// 3. ç±»å¸¸é‡å¯è§æ€§
13class Config {
14    private const SECRET = 'xxx';
15    public const PUBLIC_KEY = 'pub';
16}
17
18// 4. å¤šå¼‚å¸¸æ•è·
19try {
20    throw new InvalidArgumentException("Bad input");
21} catch (InvalidArgumentException | OutOfRangeException $e) {
22    echo "Caught: " . $e->getMessage();
23}
24
25// 5. å¯¹ç§°æ•°ç»„è§£æ„
26[$a, $b] = [10, 20];
27['name' => $n, 'age' => $a] = ['name' => 'Bob', 'age' => 30];
28
29// 6. è´Ÿå­—ç¬¦ä¸²åç§»
30echo "hello"[-1]; // 'o'
31
32// 7. iterable ä¼ªç±»å‹
33function process(iterable $items): void {
34    foreach ($items as $item) {}
35}
36process([1, 2]);
37process(new ArrayIterator([3, 4]));
38
39// 8. å¼ƒç”¨ create_function()
40// $f = create_function('$a,$b', 'return $a+$b;'); // âŒ Deprecated in 7.2, removed in 7.2+
41$f = fn($a, $b) => $a + $b; // âœ…

ğŸ”¹ PHP 7.2

 1// 1. object ç±»å‹æç¤º
 2function cloneIt(object $obj): object {
 3    return clone $obj;
 4}
 5
 6// 2. is_countable()
 7$data = [1, 2, 3];
 8if (is_countable($data)) {
 9    echo count($data); // 3
10}
11
12// 3. å†…ç½® Sodiumï¼ˆç°ä»£åŠ å¯†ï¼‰
13$key = random_bytes(SODIUM_CRYPTO_SECRETBOX_KEYBYTES);
14$nonce = random_bytes(SODIUM_CRYPTO_SECRETBOX_NONCEBYTES);
15$ciphertext = sodium_crypto_secretbox('secret', $nonce, $key);
16
17// 4. stream_isatty()
18if (stream_isatty(STDOUT)) {
19    echo "Running in terminal\n";
20}
21
22// 5. spl_object_id()ï¼ˆæ¯” hash æ›´å¿«ï¼‰
23$obj = new stdClass();
24$id = spl_object_id($obj); // int
25
26// 6. unserialize é»˜è®¤ç¦ç”¨å¯¹è±¡ååºåˆ—åŒ–
27$data = serialize(new stdClass());
28// unserialize($data); // âŒ Notice: unserialize(): Class __PHP_Incomplete_Class not allowed
29$obj = unserialize($data, ['allowed_classes' => ['stdClass']]); // âœ…
30
31// 7. ç§»é™¤ __autoload()
32// function __autoload($class) {} // âŒ Fatal error
33spl_autoload_register(function($class) { /* ... */ }); // âœ…

ğŸ”¹ PHP 7.3

 1// 1. çµæ´» Heredoc
 2$html = <<<HTML
 3    <div>
 4        Hello World
 5    </div>
 6    HTML;
 7
 8// 2. JSON å¼‚å¸¸
 9try {
10    json_decode('{invalid json}', flags: JSON_THROW_ON_ERROR);
11} catch (JsonException $e) {
12    echo "JSON Error: " . $e->getMessage();
13}
14
15// 3. æ–°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‡½æ•°
16var_dump(str_contains('hello world', 'world'));      // true
17var_dump(str_starts_with('https://', 'http'));       // true
18var_dump(str_ends_with('file.txt', '.txt'));         // true
19
20// 4. å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨æœ«å°¾é€—å·
21$values = array_merge(
22    [1, 2],
23    [3, 4],   // å…è®¸é€—å·
24);
25
26// 5. array_key_first / array_key_last
27$arr = ['a' => 1, 'b' => 2];
28echo array_key_first($arr); // a
29echo array_key_last($arr);  // b
30
31// 6. hrtime() é«˜ç²¾åº¦æ—¶é—´
32$start = hrtime(true);
33usleep(1000);
34$end = hrtime(true);
35echo "Elapsed: " . ($end - $start) / 1e6 . " Î¼s\n";
36
37// 7. å¼ƒç”¨èŠ±æ‹¬å·è®¿é—®
38// echo $str{0}; // âŒ Deprecated
39echo $str[0]; // âœ…

ğŸ”¹ PHP 7.4

 1// 1. å±æ€§ç±»å‹å£°æ˜
 2class User {
 3    public int $id;
 4    public ?string $name = null;
 5}
 6$user = new User();
 7$user->id = 100;
 8
 9// 2. ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°
10$factor = 10;
11$nums = array_map(fn($n) => $n * $factor, [1, 2, 3]); // [10,20,30]
12
13// 3. ç©ºåˆå¹¶èµ‹å€¼
14$config = [];
15$config['debug'] ??= true;
16
17// 4. åå˜è¿”å› & é€†å˜å‚æ•°
18interface Factory {
19    function make(): object;
20}
